Returns: This builder object with a new point added.
Parameters: A @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#LatLng_E@ to be included in the bounds.
include(com.google.android.gms.maps.mode.Description: Includes this point for building of the bounds. The bounds will be extended in a minimum way to include this point. More precisely, it will consider extending the bounds both in the eastward and westward directions (one of which may cross the antimeridian) and choose the smaller of the two. In the case that both directions result in a LatLngBounds of the same size, this will extend it in the eastward direction. For example, adding points (0, -179) and (1, 179) will create a bound crossing the 180 longitude.

Throws: if no points have been included.

ClassDesc: This is a builder that is able to create a minimum bound based on a set of LatLng points.
